title: 1952 Winter Olympics
summary: The 1952 Winter Olympics, officially known as the VI Olympic Winter Games (Norwegian: De 8. olympiske vinterleker; Nynorsk: Dei 8. olympiske vinterleikane) and commonly known as Oslo 1952, was a winter multi-sport event held from 14 to 25Â February 1952 in Oslo, the capital of Norway.
